title: Female General And Eldest Princess - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Martial Arts   Romance   Yuri
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Adopted Children   Ancient China   Archery   Army   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Brotherhood   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Character Growth   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cross-dressing   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Friendship   Generals   Gore   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Hiding True Identity   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Marriage   Military   Misunderstandings   Persistent Love Interests   Politics   Power Couple   Power Struggle   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Selfless Protagonist   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Soldiers   Strategic Battles   Strong to Stronger   Time Skip   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love   Wars
author: 请君莫笑
description:
In order to survive in troubled times; in order to get revenge for loved ones; in order to claim justice for all 118 people who died undeservedly in the village. Lin WanYue took the residence registration of her younger brother Lin FeiXing to join the army, and was determined to kill the Huns all over the world.

The empress died at court, leaving the 16 year-old princess and the 8-year-old crown prince to rely upon each other for their lives. Several princes older than the crown prince were greedy for the throne, and the two were in a precarious position.>
